sentence.Network_en: Latterly, he has written extensively about alternative medicine.
sentence.Network_cn: 近来，他写了大量有关替代医学的文章。

sentence.Network_en: Latterly his painting has shown a new freedom of expression.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近，他的绘画展示出一种新的自由表现形式。

sentence.Network_en: City centres were abandoned first by residents, then by shops, and latterly by businesses.
sentence.Network_cn: 首先是当地居民搬离市中心，继而是商铺，近日各个企业也开始迁出。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(L) ... latter-wit 过后的聪明 latterly 最近地 lattermost 最后的.
long since中文 ... 近距离系统 in-plant system 近来 latterly;not long since 近旁模型 nearby model.
此后的英汉词典搜索结果，点击看详细翻译解释 ... (from then onwards) 此后 (latterly) 后来 (from) 自…以来.
《德伯家的苔丝》第二十八章_第3页... ... unbiased 没有偏见的 latterly 近来;在晚年;在后期 circumspectly 慎重地.

list.abs: The spelling was first affected , but latterly the meaning also ., 起初是拼写受到了影响 , 但最近意义也受到了影响.

but- it must now be said- another portion of the community had latterly begun to take its own view of the relation betwixt Mr. Dimmesdale and the mysterious old physician .但是，我们现在必须说明的是，后来另外一部分居民开始对丁梅斯代尔先生和那神秘的老医生之间的关系持有异议了。
her face had latterly changed with changing states of mind fluctuating between beauty and ordinariness , according as the thoughts were gay or grave .她近来的面貌，跟着她的心境变换；心境有时忧郁，有时快活，面目也随着有时平常，有时美丽。

entry.def: You can use latterly to indicate that a situation or event is the most recent one.

example.ex: He was to remain active in the association, latterly as vice president, for the rest of his life...
example.tran: 他此后一生都活跃于协会中，后来还当上了副会长。

example.ex: City centres were abandoned first by residents, then by shops, and latterly by businesses...
example.tran: 首先是当地居民搬离市中心，继而是商铺，近日各个企业也开始迁出。

sentences.sentence: "as late as yesterday she was fine"
"the spelling was first affected, but latterly the meaning also"

auth_sentence.content: Fairbairn has latterly turned his attention to the problems of psychotherapy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fairbairn has latterly turned his attention to the problems of psychotherapy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fairbairn has latterly turned his attention to the problems of psychotherapy.

auth_sentence.content: He died...at Hammersmith, though latterly he resided chiefly at Bath.
auth_sentence.res_content: He died...at Hammersmith, though latterly he resided chiefly at Bath.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He died...at Hammersmith, though latterly he resided chiefly at Bath.

sentences.en: It’s only been latterly that we’ve discovered that it’s lots of individual reefs, around about 2,900 separate reef systems which make up the Great Barrier Reef.
sentences.cn: 直到近来我们才发现，它们其实是众多独立的礁石，大约有2900个独立的礁石系，组成了大堡礁。
